comment: Quizzes straight out of the book, 500 word journals most classes, 4 essay assignments. Do the work and get extra credit for taking your essays into the writing center. This course is an easy A if you have a fully functioning human brain. Oh, and don't use contractions.
Great professor. She has an attendance policy but it's in-line with KSU's policy. Her class is hard, but she's usually clear and helpful. Funny, too. Would recommend!
I don't know about the other jerks who posted that she's terrible, but she was awesome and I do recommend her.

This is not a real professor, she is a Teachers assistant at the college and it shows. She is not very friendly and her class requires a lot of work. She does not work well with students who have jobs. Her grading is horrible.

I dont remember her saying she was popular. She said she was a dork. Quizzes are open book, journals are word count - no grammar, 4 essays. She never cancelled class, but we got out early a bunch of times. Takes attendence, but it's based on KSU's policy. Assignment sheets are kind of confusing, but she gave models. Friendly and helpful if you ask

STAY AWAY FROM THIS PROFESSOR. She was the worst professor I have ever had. She was inconsistent with her grading. No people skills. Told all her students she was popular in high school, though you could tell she was not. She does not need to be teaching and should seriously consider another profession.

This professor is rude and unprofessional. She argues with all her students. She is a terrible grader. She can never clarify what exactly she wants. She assigns way too much homework. Avoid this professor by any means necessary. You will want out as soon as you're in.

3 essay+1 revision. Journal or Short Response due by next class. No late work. NO READING! Must bring books to class whether or not used. 3tardy=1 absence. 3Absence, loose a letter grade. Never cancels. Harsh grader, open to negotiation. Extra cred for going to writing lab. Willing to help if you ask. OCD, Self-Conscious, Easily sidetracked.

This professor acts like a high school student, and that is also how she treats her students. She has no problem calling a student out in front of the class for a mistake they made in a paper or in the homework. If you do not keep up with her pages, you will miss assignments. She will NEVER cancel class, and you strictly  MUST be there.

This professor is extremely rude and unprofessional. She is disrespectful to her students and requires homework every night. She also is unable to clearly define what she is looking for in a paper. Her voice is very shaken and can become quite annoying. She tends to treat her students like they are back in grade school Avoid if possible!
Was ok in the beginning until she graded the essays. She can be very harsh and rude with her comments and grading.
